RuSha#yOq vA indra#M praqtyakShaqM nApa#Syaqn taM ~Mvasi#ShThaH praqtyakSha#mapaSyaqth sO$&bravIqd-brAhma#NaM tE vakShyAmiq yathAq tvatpu#rOhitAH praqjAH pra#janiqShyantE&thaq mEta#rEByaq RuShi#ByOq mA pravO#caq itiq tasmA# 
EqtAnthstOma#-BAgAnabravIqt tatOq vasi#ShThapurOhitAH praqjAH prAjA#yantaq tasmA$d-vAsiqShThO braqhmA kAqrya#H praiva jA#yatE raqSmira#siq kShayA#ya tvAq kShaya#M jiqnvE - [  ]   5
